professional_summary: Experienced Database Developer with expertise in Data Warehousing, ETL processes, and network administration. Proficient in SQL Server, SSIS/SSRS, and various BI tools.

key_responsibilities: Designed and implemented data warehouse models using Star Schema.
Created staging databases and secured data with encryption techniques.
Responsible for network administration and system maintenance.
Monitored network performance and troubleshooted issues.
Administered group policies and active directory on Windows OS.
